name: The Many Made Whole
description: Exchange 10 Riven Slivers for a Riven Mod

languages.description: Tausche 10 Riven-Scherben für eine Riven-Mod ein.
languages.name: Viele wurden ganz

languages.description: Échanger 10 Brisures Rivens contre un Mod Riven
languages.name: Petit à petit

languages.description: Scambia 10 Schegge Riven per un Riven Mod

languages.description: Intercambia 10 fragmentos de Agrietado por un mod Agrietado
languages.name: De muchos se hace uno

languages.description: 用 10 个裂罅碎块换取一张裂罅 Mod
languages.name: 聚沙成卡

languages.description: Обменяйте 10 осколков Разлома на мод Разлома

languages.description: Rivenの破片10個をRiven MODと交換する

languages.description: Wymień 10 Okruchów Riven na Mod Riven

languages.description: 用 10 個裂罅 MOD 碎片換取一張裂罅 MOD

languages.description: 10 Riven Şeridini bir Riven Modu ile değiştir
